expage-201611 - global glacial 10Be and 26Al exposure age data

Owen et al. (2002)	boulder	Owen2002-31	Owen2002-K	KK98-65	36.436	74.866	2680	5	2.7	0.99	1360000	30000	LLNL3000	7970000	280000	KNSTD	1998	40000	800	39600	1400	44780	2590	999	44466	3419	1597	-

Reference:
Owen LA, Finkel RC, Caffee MW, Gualtieri L, 2002. Timing of multiple late Quaternary glaciations in the Hunza Valley, Karakoram Mountains, northern Pakistan: defined by cosmogenic radionuclide dating of moraines. Geological Society of America Bulletin 114, 593-604.

Data comments:
Sample thickness, sample density, and 10Be standard derived from Owen and Dortch (2014) supplementary table.
26Al standard assumed to be KNSTD.
Sampling year based on sample names.

expage.github.io
